category_desc:
By contents, we must understand any element present on the Drumee desktop. These elements are declined in two main forms: the folders and the files.
- In the folders, we find the personal folder of blue color, the box of transfer in orange color and the internal shared folder in purple;
- In the simple files, we find the document, image, photo, video ....

metadata.RH:
Whether they are single files or folders, you can perform a «drag and drop» directly from your computer.
A second solution to import one or more single files is to click on the button positioned at the top of the Drumee desktop, to the right of the «Search» bar, then click on the «Import» button.

Click on a content. A window opens if it is a folder, while the single file opens in preview mode. To move the open content, make a continuous click on the top colored bar. To change their size, stretch the sides .

metadata.LH: Organize your content on the desktop
metadata.RH:
Click continuously on a icon (representing the content to move) and move it between two other items.
If the icons to move are next to each other on the other hand, you can perform a multiple selection by clicking continuously so as to encompass the desired icons (a rectangle is formed on the background of the desktop). Thus, you move several contents at the same time.

metadata.LH: Create and use a first folder
metadata.RH: Click on the located in the bottom bar: it is created on the desktop. Name it. Then click to open it, drag & drop , inside, contents of your Drumee desktop and / or simple files / folders on your computer.

Hover over the icon and click on the selection box (positioned at the top left corner). Then, click on the button located on the right in the bottom bar.
Another way is to drag and drop the icon directly on the button .

category_desc:
For internal communications (only possible with contacts who have accepted the invitation), you can use the chat / internal video .
For external communications [possible with all your contacts (registered or not in Drumee)], you must use the call / external video .

metadata.RH:
Click on the button positioned in the bottom bar. Once the window is open, click on the button (positioned in the top color strip), specify the contact's email, then invite him.
It is also possible to invite a contact, by clicking on the button located at the top of the Drumee desktop, to the left of the « Search » bar.

metadata.LH: Chat, video call with internal contacts
metadata.RH: Click on the button in the bottom bar. You can chat, send items, make a video call (you need at least a first contact).

Click on the button located in the bottom bar. Once the window is open, click on the “+” button, placed on the left in the colored banner of the window, to create a new meeting. Fill in the information and invite contacts.

category_desc:
To transfer content externally (outside of Drumee's address book), «external transfer boxes» are created.
To share content internally (ie with contacts who have accepted your invitation via Drumee), we create “internal shared folders” .

metadata.RH: Click on the button located in the bottom bar. When the box is created on the desktop, click on it to open it, drag in the content (s) to transfer. Then, click on the button placed at the top left in the colored banner, to send an email from notification and send .

The internal shared folder can be sent if and only if your contacts have accepted your invitation to join you on Drumee.
Click on the located in the bottom bar. Once the internal shared folder is created on the desktop, click on it to open it, drag the content (s) you want to share and send .

When an external transfer box or an internal shared folder is open, to configure or delete them, click on the positioned in the colored banner of the external transfer box or internal shared folder. Configure them by specifying the rights, the list of contacts, etc ... and / or delete them by clicking on the located to the left of the window.
